column4: Hello, every time during boot, I get an error message along the lines of "kinit: no resume image, doing normal boot".  Is this something I should be worried about?  I have no problems with the installation, everything works, just kind of an annoying message.
no that's normal it basically means that your system has not been suspended, and therefore isn't restoring a suspended image
at least that's always been my take on it o.O
very well, makes sense :) Thank you
